kit.leader_skill: "Realm of Gods" or "Universe 6" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Sphere of Destruction
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers ATK

passive_skill.name: Champa's Strategy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 166% up; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 22% up; (Forever) "Realm of Gods" or "Universe 6" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 66% up; When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Realm of Gods" or "Universe 6" Category characters: ATK 166% up; Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 22% up; Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL & PHY excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; For every Ki Sphere obtained: DEF 111% up (up to 666%); 6 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit & damage reduction rate 22% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK 166% up; 66% chance of ATK & DEF 166% up; 6% chance of ATK 1666% up
